viirs_product.citation: Elvidge, C.D. et al. (2021). Annual time series of global VIIRS nighttime lights derived from monthly averages: 2012 to 2019. Remote Sensing, 13(5), 922.

median_masked.description: Median radiance with stray light correction and background masking applied
median_masked.citation: Elvidge, C.D. et al. (2017). VIIRS night-time lights. Int. J. Remote Sensing, 38(21), 5860-5879.

average_masked.description: Average radiance with stray light correction and background masking applied
average_masked.citation: Elvidge, C.D. et al. (2017). VIIRS night-time lights. Int. J. Remote Sensing, 38(21), 5860-5879.

cf_cvg.description: Number of cloud-free observations used in the annual composite

lit_mask.description: Binary mask identifying lit pixels (1) vs background pixels (0)
